channel.title: Need some help with clicking

item.title: Need some help with clicking
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

So Im adding skillguides but Iâ€™m having some troubles;
Base is delta (packaged)

This my code in clickingmost:
error: atkinterface cannot be resolved to a variable

case 33206:
			c.sendSkillInterface(atkInterface);
			break;

This is my skillguides class:

package server.skills;

import server.client;
import server.clickingMost;

public class SkillGuides {
	

	public static void sendSkillInterface(client c, int id[]) {
		c.outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(53);
		c.outStream.writeWord(8847);
		c.outStream.writeWord(id.length);
		for (int i = 0; i < id.length; i++) {
			c.outStream.writeByte(1);
			if(id[i] > 0) {
				c.outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(id[i]+1);
			} else {
				c.outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(0);
			}
		}
		c.outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord();   
		c.flushOutStream();
	}
	
	private static int item[] = new int[31];

	public static void skillsInterface(client c, String skill, 
					int item1ItemId, int item1lvl, String item1lvldef, 
					int item2ItemId, int item2lvl, String item2lvldef, 
					int item3ItemId, int item3lvl, String item3lvldef, 
					int item4ItemId, int item4lvl, String item4lvldef, 
					int item5ItemId, int item5lvl, String item5lvldef, 
					int item6ItemId, int item6lvl, String item6lvldef, 
					int item7ItemId, int item7lvl, String item7lvldef, 
					int item8ItemId, int item8lvl, String item8lvldef) {

		c.sendFrame126("@dre@"+skill, 8716);
		for(int i = 0;i<31;i++) {
			item[i] = 0;
		}
		item[0] = item1ItemId;
		item[1] = item2ItemId;
		item[2] = item3ItemId;
		item[3] = item4ItemId;
		item[4] = item5ItemId;
		item[5] = item6ItemId;
		item[6] = item7ItemId;
		item[7] = item8ItemId;
		if(item1lvl > 0)
		c.sendFrame126(""+item1lvl,8720);
		c.sendFrame126(""+item1lvldef,8760);
		if(item2lvl > 0)
		c.sendFrame126(""+item2lvl,8721);
		c.sendFrame126(""+item2lvldef, 8761);
		if(item3lvl > 0)
		c.sendFrame126(""+item3lvl,8722);
		c.sendFrame126(""+item3lvldef,8762);
		if(item4lvl > 0)
		c.sendFrame126(""+item4lvl,8723);
		c.sendFrame126(""+item4lvldef, 8763);
		if(item5lvl > 0)
		c.sendFrame126(""+item5lvl,8724);
		c.sendFrame126(""+item5lvldef, 8764);
		if(item6lvl > 0)
		c.sendFrame126(""+item6lvl,8725);
		c.sendFrame126(""+item6lvldef,8765);
		if(item7lvl > 0)
		c.sendFrame126(""+item7lvl,8726);
		c.sendFrame126(""+item7lvldef, 8766);
		if(item8lvl > 0)
		c.sendFrame126(""+item8lvl,8727);
		c.sendFrame126(""+item8lvldef, 8767);
		c.sendFrame126("",8849);
		c.sendFrame126("Attack",8846);
		c.sendFrame126("Strength",8823);
		c.sendFrame126("Defence",8824);
		c.sendFrame126("Hitpoints",8827);
		c.sendFrame126("Ranged",8837);
		c.sendFrame126("Magic",8840);
		c.sendFrame126("Prayer",8843);
		c.sendFrame126("RuneCraf",8859);
		c.sendFrame126("Agility",8862);
		c.sendFrame126("Herblore",8865);
		c.sendFrame126("Thieving",15303);
		c.sendFrame126("Crafting",15306);
		c.sendFrame126("Slayer",15309);
		
		sendSkillInterface(c, item);
		c.showInterface(8714);
	}
	public static void atkInterface(client c) {
		skillsInterface(c, "Attack", 
					1291, 1, "Bronze", 
					1293, 1, "Iron", 
					1295, 5, "Steel", 
					1297, 10, "Black", 
					1299, 20, "Mithril", 
					1301, 30, "Adamant", 
					1303, 40, "Rune", 
					1305, 60, "Dragon");
	}
}
